lenders.occupational_info: I do the best I can to get by.

lenders.loan_because: it feels good to know that you are making someone's load a little lighter. Some one said: "To the world you may be one person, but to one person, you may be the world."
lenders.occupational_info: about 70% of my time is spent auditioning and being a single mom. The other 30% I'm working on camera or in a voice over booth acting.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I like to contribute to the success, happiness and well being of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I design research to collect information on how people engage with  public spaces and retail stores, and various products or elements in those environments.  The research aids in store design, layout,  signage and information systems, as well as  product placement.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people reach their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graduate student and a teacher's assistant. I make a low-income, but I like to share what I have.

lenders.name: Benjamin Caudill
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping those who help themselves, while promotion capitalism and providing interest-free capital to 3rd world entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I prevent computer hackers from getting into corporate computers and networks.

lenders.name: Brendan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have a shot or two.

lenders.name: Stacey
lenders.loan_because: one of the ways a person can look after their self interests and their happiness is by giving priority to those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of animals in other people's homes when they are going to be gone for an extended amount of time.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: I want to make someones life better. ONE LOAN AT A TIME.

lenders.name: Susan and Bill
lenders.loan_because: It's important to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired educators of children aged 10 to 18

lenders.name: Bobby
lenders.loan_because: It's a very simple way for me to make someone's life better.

lenders.name: Chantell
lenders.loan_because: Where I live, there are banks that provide credit access. This is not the case everywhere.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying international development in grad school. I guess one must practice what they preach.

lenders.name: laura & Jim
lenders.loan_because: To help.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I can.   (..and I am grateful for that.)

lenders.name: Will
lenders.loan_because: I feel that people need the oportunity to be sucsesful at what they want to do

lenders.name: Jeremy B. Shapiro
lenders.loan_because: Many people have helped me over the years, and this is one of my ways of giving back.
lenders.occupational_info: I help entrepreneurs get their passion off of paper and into practice through marketing consulting, product creation and business consulting

lenders.name: chelsea + landon
lenders.occupational_info:
chelsea is an architectural designer with gensler, a global design firm spanning 30 offices worldwide.
http://gensler.com/

landon is a market developer at chempoint, north america's largest e-distributor of fine and specialty chemicals.
http://www.chempoint.com/

lenders.name: Rae
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I want to see people, especially women, become more independent, and have a better life for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I helped older people living in a large community of apartments, with messages, mail, order meals, answer phones, took guest and maintence orders,

lenders.name: Jeff, Tanya & family
lenders.loan_because: We lend as a family.  Each of us want to help.

lenders.name: Rene Guerrero
lenders.loan_because: "What can I give back to God for the blessings he's poured out on me? I'll lift high the cup of salvation as a toast to our Father, I'll fulfill a promise I made to him." Bono, Elevation 2001, Live from Boston (listen to it at link below)
lenders.occupational_info: We enjoy running, biking, lifting weights and spending time with family.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: As a family with young children who have a great life together we want to help others enjoy the fruits of their labours too.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business owner, and work very hard. I want to help others with the same work ethic who have not had the lucky breaks in life that we have had.

lenders.name: ariana
lenders.loan_because: those who have money should give to those who don't
lenders.occupational_info: i make books

lenders.name: Tambobamba
lenders.loan_because: I want others to have the opportunity to build a business and provide for themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working to build a food company that provides great tasting, healthy products AND builds community and bridges cultural gaps with our friends in Latin America.

lenders.name: Hayley
lenders.loan_because: Most of the time it takes money to make money. I put myself through college with several jobs and the help of loans. I don't know where I would be today without that opportunity to get an education. At some point, everyone who aspires to something greater is going to need some kind of a loan.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an Aerospace company that designs, builds, and launches communication and weather satellites, amongst other space related products and services.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: The rate of return--social and economic--far exceeds that from depositing in a multinational bank.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an economist fighting for progressive economic policies and social democracy in the U.S. and around the world.

lenders.name: Julien
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who start their own business

lenders.name: Richard Blake
lenders.loan_because: by small and simple things are great things brought to pass.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with hi-tech companies to help them raise money from investors, buy and sell other companies and comply with corporate governance and SEC regulations

lenders.name: Rupa
lenders.loan_because: it makes me happy to think I could make even a little difference in somebody's life.

lenders.name: Mel
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people and see the results of that rather than just donate at random.  By loaning in this way I can help different people with the same money, over and over again, and I know those people can use the money for what they want and need.
lenders.occupational_info: my work involves helping people if they can't use my companies computer systems, and if there are any problems or things that need to be changed I manage that process with the people who write the computer programme.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I believe strongly in empowerment. I am all about helping people that are trying to help themselves. What a creative way to make a dent in the poverty crisis!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the homeless in Detroit, MI leading a program to help those that are ready to get off the street obtain full-time employment and permanent housing.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering women in the world to be able to feed and educate their children so that their families and communities will be healthy and happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide reports to our clients that  detail  the Service they are receiving based on our Service Level Agreements

lenders.name: Yves
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great way to enable entrepreneurship around the world.

lenders.name: Jan en Cisca
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we think helping people to build their own business is the only way for sustainable development
lenders.occupational_info:
Jan: New business development in banking sector
Cisca: geriatric doctor

lenders.name: IBI Data/Dawn
lenders.loan_because: Thank You Wendy Arnold for allowing us the opportunity to help people in other countries looking to improve their conditions and the lives of their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that helps major foodservice manufacturers market their products.

lenders.name: Mark & Barbara Morin
lenders.loan_because: After thirty years in the faith based non-profit sector and having friends and traveled these countries, we want to continue to help empower those who have real dreams to rise above & make a difference in their communities. Kiva provides us that vehicle in the most effective way.
lenders.occupational_info: Provide the best services for our clients; Help to connect passionate businesses w/ local, smaller, sustainable non-profits to make a difference

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I have been granted many blessings in this life and Kiva offers the opportunity of putting something back.

lenders.name: christine
lenders.loan_because: because everyone in this world has the right to take care for himself and his children, i have enough for that, so i want to give other people a change in their lifes

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I can - Humanity is my  family, and I want to love and support them. Why wouldn't anyone do this?
lenders.occupational_info: I serve others as often as I can, take care of their animals and make a point to smile and laugh and spread love . . .

lenders.name: Sarete
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I needed.

lenders.name: Damien
lenders.loan_because: Kiva's site keeps me grounded.  In suburban US neighborhoods it's easy to loose sight of what really matters.  Seeing the faces and reading about the dreams of others around the world puts things in perspective.
lenders.occupational_info: We have two sons, two daughters-in-law, and two adorable grandsons.

lenders.name: Hossein
lenders.loan_because: To Make a difference
lenders.occupational_info:
I manage differnet construction projects for Transit industry. It is very neat and I get to meet wonderful people.
This picture was taken when I was building a tree-house for my kids in the back yard.

lenders.name: Joe Ingeno
lenders.loan_because: Microfinancing lifts people out of poverty, and empowers them to support themselves by starting their own businesses.  Entrepreneurs are an important part of any economy.  They provide consumers with choices, create jobs for workers, and are innovators by creating new products and services or improving on existing ones.  I am happy to be able to support and encourage entrepreneurship around the world, and highly recommend it to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am originally form southern California, and moved to south Florida to attend the University of Miami. I still reside in south Florida and work in the information technology field.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: Everybody needs a little help sometimes..
lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people a hand up, not a hand out.  This provides on-going, hopefully long-term results.  I enjoy working with entrepreneurs, and am always excited to encourage entrepreneurship.
lenders.occupational_info: "Your Small Business Advisors."

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.occupation: Office Manager for ER Physicians Group
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great opportunity to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a great job managing the day to day operations of a ER Physician's office.

lenders.name: Rytis
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the world. I know that money is very important for start-ups, as I am currently working on establishing my own company.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: I believe these small loans can make a big difference in the lives of people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from the U.S. Navy and my own publishing company.

lenders.name: Hemanshu
lenders.loan_because: My parents worked very hard to make a living for our family and I want to help another family do the same.  Life is full circle and this helps me remember that.
lenders.occupational_info: I help figure out what companies we should invest our money in.  So like how Kiva invests in people, we invest in companies.  The main difference is that we do it for the hope of making a profit.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I support the desire to own a business and taken care of the family.
lenders.occupational_info: I've started my own company so I am completely sympathetic to the challenges, frustrations and joys of owning a business.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: If I needed it, I'd hope someone would be willing to help me out so I should do the same. It all goes back to the golden rule.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I feel like it's a small way I can help others who might not have the same opportunities and resources that I do.

lenders.name: A guy
lenders.loan_because: these people work harder than I have ever had to.
lenders.occupational_info: I wouldn't try.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: I admire people who want to take the initiative to make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I prepare financial statements for a large multinational corporation.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people  make their own lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Trauma Center, taking care of sick and injured people.

lenders.name: Omeed
lenders.loan_because: I want to contribute to a more sustainable future and believe that financial services should be available to all who can benefit from them
lenders.occupational_info: Infrastructure and development

lenders.name: A Quaker Meeting
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to help spread peace throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a committee of Winston-Salem Friends Meeting that strives to promote peace and social justice.

lenders.name: JC Logan
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.  America should step up to the plate and learn how to give and share, instead of take take take.  We are very fortunate in this country.  My mantra is  "live to learn and learn to live". In helping one another achieve their dream we make the world a better place FOR ALL.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist that is blessed with a tremendous gift , The gift of creation, for which I am truly grateful. To enlighten others to find their gift and to act on the gift by giving back all that you are here to give.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: Raising money.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: We all need help empowering each other now and then. I am grateful for what I have and send out what I can with hopefulness and love.

lenders.name: Cobe
lenders.loan_because: I believe that women will save the world - one small loan at a time - and since it takes so little to help - why not support these amazing women?
lenders.occupational_info: I am now happily retired.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: The whole fish or fishing pole thing.  This process seems efficient and effective.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with data products about demographics and consumer behaviors.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people with their businesses.

lenders.name: Randy
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and build handheld computers and other useful gadgets.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: It's in the interest of humanity to do as much as possible to bring the developing world up to economic par with the Global North.

lenders.name: Libby
lenders.loan_because: I have way more than I need.

lenders.name: Ellis
lenders.loan_because: It's an amazing way to break down the distance between human beings.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a sociologist at the University of California, Davis. I teach. I write books. I try to make the world a little better.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a start and an opportunity.  I was given many.  Paying it forward.  Also, this is a very safe, feel good  investment:  My returns are extraordinary!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach International Business, Marketing,  and Global Issues at Universities.  I empower my children in their pursuits and hope to create passion around social justice.

lenders.name: Illy/ Carrie
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in someones life, and spread kindness throughout the world.

lenders.name: Allysum
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people all over the world and make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an RV (caravan) Dealership as an Admin Assistant

lenders.name: Le Kim
lenders.loan_because: So many people have helped me over the years and being a Kiva lender is one small way to pay it forward...

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: Capitalism is the the single greatest opportunity in history to lift peopl from poverty.

lenders.name: Venla
lenders.loan_because: I find it inspiring to co-operate with people who are motivated and able to help themselves and people in their communities.

lenders.name: Ponch
lenders.loan_because: It's not money what we are lending. It's is Hope.

lenders.name: Destiny
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and God has blessed me so I should return the favor.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children 8-9 years old basic math, reading and writing.

lenders.name: Harm
lenders.loan_because: A simple and effective way to help other people.
lenders.occupational_info: Supporting citizens of Rotterdam in improving their own neighbourhood

lenders.name: Chim
lenders.loan_because:
I believe:

- In entrepreneurship 
- It is right to give a chance to someone to grow his or her own business.
- In micro-financing
- It is a matter of giving and receiving.

It is cool to recycle the loans to other people who need it.

Also, be generous to the world and the world may be generous to you.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a product specialist for Google. I launch new features and products and also I train the Brazilian sales team for all the news things from the company.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who want to help themselves but cannot afford to.
lenders.occupational_info: clerical, secretarial in Dining at a university

lenders.name: Eli
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently attending Highschool, and I am optimistic about my future.

lenders.name: Sachin
lenders.loan_because: I hope that this small contribution can help people achieve their big dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Data Analytics

lenders.name: Greg & Julie
lenders.loan_because: I want to see motivated and energetic people help make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school science and math.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: Poverty is like punishment for a crime you didn't commit.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to be a lawyer so I can advocate for those who need help and are disadvantaged in the legal system.

lenders.name: VALENCIA
lenders.loan_because: I GIVE BECAUSE "I SHOULD"...  I don't have much in material things, but I do have a place to call home, a job to pay the bills and most importantly - my health.  I AM BLESSED. :)

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: Even a small amount of money can make a huge difference in another part of the world.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneurial student, and I feel like lending really could help someone fund their own business, as I hope will someday will happen to me: in short, karma.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student learning about business

lenders.name: Montana
lenders.loan_because: I support Kiva's motives.  People in poor countries deserve an opportunity to make money if they are willing to work.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and install electrical systems (lights, power, etc.)

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Alden
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to have a positive impact  on others .

lenders.name: Shanna
lenders.loan_because: I want to "pay it forward".
lenders.occupational_info: My primary job is cleaning homes. I am also a graphic designer, as well as a Project Coordinator for an on-line newsletter that spreads environmental awareness.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I like knowing that small loans can be combined to give someone a chance at a more fulfilling life, and it is a way of connecting with people and parts of the world in a positive and peaceful manner.

lenders.name: mike
lenders.loan_because: I feel very fortunate to live in ( relative) wealth in the U.S. and am glad to loan a small ammount of $ to someone who can use it.
lenders.occupational_info: I own and manage a company in Colorado that trims,removes, sprays and palnts trees.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: I am one of the lucky ones who has been given a huge head start in life.  Kiva is one of several ways I feel I can do something to alter the imbalance that exists in our world. But I gotta say "WOW!" to Kiva - What an amazing idea!!! Truly Revolutionary.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: investing in people's dreams and futures is a lot more rewarding than investing in gold-plated rims.

lenders.name: Bernard
lenders.loan_because: Helping people be self sufficient must be the way to go
lenders.occupational_info: Just boring office stuff

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: Because this is what I do with my extra money.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in Jr. High.  I'm just having fun.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I've loaned money before, but this seems like a much more worthy cause. It's not always about making money, but helping those that are working hard and deserve access to needed funds.
lenders.occupational_info: I design occupant safety systems for the automotive industry; Air Bags and Seat Belts.

lenders.name: DragonFly
lenders.loan_because: it is a way to give back to the universe...
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain a light industrial electronics factory... helping co-workers with production issues.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: it's time we empower the women of this world...

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: Helping others find happiness is the only way to find true happiness within yourself.
lenders.occupational_info: I run the takeout window of an Outback Steakhouse in central New York.

lenders.name: Misti
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other mothers make a difference in thier childrens lives and thier community.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm lucky enough to be able to stay home and raise my children and take care of my husband.  In addition, I do a lot of volunteer work for a local domestic violence shelter and an Organization called Choice Humanitarian.

lenders.name: Taylor Mountain
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a good idea to help out, since we seem to have a leg up over here in the western world.
lenders.occupational_info: ATTENDING UNIVERSITY

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: As a doctor, I took care of people one at a time, and grew to delight in it.
lenders.occupational_info: For twenty years, I treated babies and children for all kinds of medical problems. I retired after my husband died. Now I write books.

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because: It's awesome lulz
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure people don't look at porn in the library.

lenders.name: Leslie Sandberg
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so much in my life, I want to give to others and share the comfort.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach teens in the arts and performing arts.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: Currently a student Need loan for my webhosting business as it grows more demands are need.
lenders.occupational_info: Administrator of websites. Update Websites Plans. Data Entry for all accounts

lenders.name: Channette, Sweden
lenders.loan_because: I want to support those who take a leap of faith and take the chanse to improve there current situation.
